page.title: 18Playground Games.
page.content:
{40 40 IN.}Someone is IT, and the other people run and hide.There is a post which is HOME and where the person on IT counts to 44. When he's finished counting he has to look for the people hiding and they have to try to get to the post unseen and say 40 40 IN or race IT to the post. The first person to be caught 40 40 OUT is the next it. Vicki Bowden age 11.
{JAIL GAME}is a favourite game at school. There are 2 equal teams. One team runs and the other chases. The team that is chasing has to catch the runners. When they do they put them in a jail, and their team mates have to free them without being caught themselves. When the whole team is caught they swap around. Steven Bull age 11
